articles.author: Pieter Haeck
articles.title: Qatargate: Italian MEP Andrea Cozzolino arrested, fights extradition to Belgium - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The lawmaker was detained in Naples at the request of the Belgian authorities.
articles.content:
Italian MEP Andrea Cozzolino was arrested on Friday night in the probe connected to alleged corruption in the European Parliament, his lawyer confirmed to POLITICO. He’s back home now.

articles.title: Juice on final stretch for launch to Jupiter - European Space Agency
articles.description: ESA’s mission to explore Jupiter and its largest moons has safely arrived at Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana, where final preparations for its April launch are now underway.The Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer – better known as Juice – arrived on 8 February at …
articles.content:
ESAs mission to explore Jupiter and its largest moons has safely arrived at Europes Spaceport in French Guiana, where final preparations for its April launch are now underway.
